title: 3 Reasons We Take People’s Opinions Too Seriously & 3 Ways to Stop Letting Them Define You
description:
If On Purpose inspires you, Jay’s exclusive Genius workshops and meditations will take your life to the next level. Go to https://shetty.cc/OnPurposeGenius to learn more.

Have you ever stopped doing something because you were scared of what other people will think? Has this held you back from your true self?

On this episode of On Purpose, Jay Shetty talks about why we take other's opinions so seriously and let go of this obsession today.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
